text: Kuusamo is a town in Northern Ostrobothnia, Finland. It is in the eastern part of Lapland. Kuusamo has an area of . As of January 2014, it had a population of almost 16,000 people. Neighbouring municipalities are Posio, Salla, Suomussalmi and Taivalkoski. Oulanka National Park is in the areas of Kuusamo and Salla. Kuusamo is the main winter sports center. It is known for its largest ski resort called Ruka. There is also an airport in Kuusamo. == Other websites == * The official Kuusamo page Category:Towns in Finland Category:Municipalities of North Ostrobothnia Category:Lapland Category:Ski areas and resorts in Finland
title: Kuusamo
